name: buy_buy_buy
description: How the giant imbecile Ricardo Salles (the current Minister of the Environment) treats every catastrophe generated by him, by his landowner friends, under a narrow view of selling everything to generate money, as he cannot see the greatest wealth we have. Of the ministers of this dreadful and genocidal mismanagement, it is what made the dirty game with the land grabbers, farmers and extractivists for Jair "Bag of garbage" Bolsonaro to remain calm.
